answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.What was the cause of your miscarriage? Chromosomal abnormalities, infections, lupus, diabetes, thyroid disorders, infection, and hormonal problems all can cause a miscarriage. If it was a treatable cause get it treated. I think you and your partner both should see an infertility expert. A clinical examination and tests like hormonal assay, pelvic scan may be helpful. A sperm analysis of your partner may provide some clue. I sincerely hope it helps.Best wishes and regards!

question: me and my boyfriend have been trying ttc for almost a year. I have been using the ovulation test to track my.ovulation and we have sex often even on the days the test reads positive but nothing happens. I have been pregnant before but I had a miscarriage. my period is regular I just don't know what going on im starting to think I can't have kid's
title: concern
